trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de momento da conceção para <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controlos.

trans-unit.source: EditorPartDesigner is a public implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner> base class for the purpose of rendering <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: EditorPartDesigner é uma implementação pública do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner>classe com o objetivo de composição base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos no momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner>

trans-unit.source: It adds the capability of carrying zone information from the associated control into design view, but does not otherwise change the functionality of the parent control.
trans-unit.target: -Adiciona a capacidade de as devidas informação de zona do controlo associado numa vista de estrutura, mas não; caso contrário, não altere a funcionalidade do controlo principal.

trans-unit.source: As with other control designers, you can change the design-time rendering of custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls by inheriting from EditorPartDesigner and overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Como com outros designers de controlo, pode alterar a composição de tempo de criação de personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos ao herdar de EditorPartDesigner e substituir a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: If you want to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.CreateViewControl%2A> method, be sure to include the base implementation so as to retain zone information.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender substituir a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.CreateViewControl%2A>método, não se esqueça de incluir a implementação base, de modo a manter informações de zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.CreateViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control to render at design time.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia da associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controlo a compor no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden to copy zone information to the view control.
trans-unit.target: Este método é substituído para copiar a informação de zona para o controlo de vista.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.

Verifies that the control resides in a zone of type <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref>, and then gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o controlo reside numa zona de tipo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref>e, em seguida, obtém a marcação que é utilizada para representar o controlo no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: The markup that is used to represent the control at design time, or error markup if the control does not reside in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O markup que é utilizada para representar o controlo no momento da conceção ou markup de erro se o controlo não reside num <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Binds the designer to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Vincula o estruturador para associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control associated with the designer.
